verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's longtime lawyer , Michael Cohen ,] [V: resigned] [ARG1: as deputy finance chair of the Republican National Committee 's Finance Committee] , sources close to the RNC told ABC News .

[ARG1: President Donald Trump 's longtime lawyer , Michael Cohen , resigned as deputy finance chair of the Republican National Committee 's Finance Committee] , [ARG0: sources close to the RNC] [V: told] [ARG2: ABC News] .
